title: 93/434/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 June 1993 amending Decision 91/643/EEC establishing a list of semen collection centres in the United States of America approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 29 June 1993 amending Decision 91/643/EEC establishing a list of semen collection centres in the United States of America approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine  species
(93/434/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 91/643/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1993.
For the Commission
RenÃ© STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 194, 22. 7. 1988, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 29.
(3) OJ No L 348, 17. 12. 1991, p. 58.
(4) OJ No L 189, 9. 7. 1992, p. 44.
